languages.text: "Надеюсь, негодяя отыщут прежде, чем еще сотня рабочих понесет незаслуженную кару".
"I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, негодяя отыщут прежде, чем еще сотня рабочих понесет незаслуженную кару".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers suffer undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers suffer undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

traits.locale_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: « J'espère que vous trouverez le coupable avant qu'une autre centaine de travailleurs ne subissent à son tour un châtiment inique. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous trouverez le coupable avant qu'une autre centaine de travailleurs ne subissent à son tour un châtiment inique. »
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: «Espero que pueda encontrar al culpable antes de que otro centenar de trabajadores sufran las mismas penurias».
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que pueda encontrar al culpable antes de que otro centenar de trabajadores sufran las mismas penurias».
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: “希望您能早日找到罪魁祸首，否则另外几百名工人恐怕也会遭到同样的不当惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."

traits.locale_text: “希望您能早日找到罪魁祸首，否则另外几百名工人恐怕也会遭到同样的不当惩罚。”
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: 「また100人以上の労働者が同じような不当な仕打ちを受ける前に、犯人を見つけられることを願っています」
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."

traits.locale_text: 「また100人以上の労働者が同じような不当な仕打ちを受ける前に、犯人を見つけられることを願っています」
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr findet den Täter, bevor noch einmal hundert Arbeiter dieselbe ungerechtfertigte Strafe erleiden müssen."
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr findet den Täter, bevor noch einmal hundert Arbeiter dieselbe ungerechtfertigte Strafe erleiden müssen."
traits.speaker: InfernusMaster

languages.text: "Umarım yüzlerce işçiyi daha aynı yersiz cezanın acısını çekmek zorunda bırakmadan önce suçluyu bulursunuz."
languages.original_text: "I hope you find the culprit before another hundred workers are forced to suffer the same undue punishment."
